name: Meathead's Words Within Words-DEC Online Trivia | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
To solve this puzzle, you must give the full word of the clue.  For instance, if the clue was OX + Henry or Harrison = University or dictionary, you would answer Oxford as the complete answer.

DEC + Red hot coals = Christmas month
DEC + Summertime beverage suffix = Ten years
DEC + Unit of electrical flow = To go away
DEC + Royal ruler = Making a ship floor
DEC + 15th or 13th day of a month in Latin calendar = Chooses
